column4: Is it typically for postfix to only listen on port 587 externally, or also port 25?
I have: smtp      inet  n       -       -       -       -       smtpd -o content_filter=smtp-amavis:[127.0.0.1]:10024
submission inet n       -       -       -       -       smtpd #  -o smtpd_tls_security_level=encrypt   -o smtpd_sasl_auth_enable=yes   -o smtpd_client_restrictions=permit_sasl_authenticated,reject
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
